story: It all began in college...same class, same batch, and a random project submission that somehow led to us to talk to each other. Little did we know that it would lead to endless conversations, laughter, and late-night talks. Over time, our bond  turned into something deeper. Now, we're finally ready to say 'forever' and celebrate it with all the people who mean the World to us!
